source_paper: Sobotkova et al. (2021) - Deploying an off-the-shelf field data collection system for archaeological survey

overall_summary.assessment_scope: Complete verification of all extracted items and relationships
overall_summary.overall_assessment: Perfect extraction quality with no errors, issues, or weaknesses detected

pass_a_accuracy_detailed.summary: Overall accuracy 100.0% - Perfect execution across all item types

evidence.notes: All 16 consolidations preserve complete information with excellent metadata

claims.notes: All claim categorisations (empirical/interpretation) and natures (descriptive/causal/evaluative) accurate

methods.notes: Both implicit methods (IM001, IM002) appropriately inferred with solid transparency gap documentation

protocols.notes: All 7 implicit protocols appropriately inferred with clear trigger text and reasoning

research_designs.notes: Both designs (RD001 evaluation, RD002 implementation) accurately represent study approach

pass_b_granularity_detailed.summary: Overall granularity 100.0% - Perfect editorial judgment across all item types

notable_consolidations: E013: Idiosyncratic organisation + multi-generational data (compound finding)
E029: Three methods + recording scope (methodological choice)
E031: Four-decade technology evolution (phase aggregation) - Exemplary
E046: TRAP precedent + workflow description (complete methodology)
E064: Unique IDs + human-readable IDs (system capability)
E069: Usage hours + records + values (major consolidation)
E082: Performance + data quality comparison (comparative outcome)

claims.notes: Consistent granularity patterns: requirements uniformly separate, capabilities uniformly separate, performance metrics uniformly separate

methods.notes: M005 appropriately consolidates multiple quality assurance approaches

protocols.notes: P011/P012 exemplary consolidations of comprehensive workflows from legacy P001/P002. P014 appropriately consolidates 3 automation examples

research_designs.notes: Two designs represent distinct dimensions (evaluation vs implementation)

key_findings: 16 evidence consolidations demonstrate exemplary editorial judgment
Zero over-splitting detected across all item types
Zero under-splitting detected across all item types
Consistent granularity patterns within item types
Functional appropriateness maintained for transparency and replicability assessment
All consolidation_metadata fields complete and justified
E031 phase aggregation exemplary: four temporal periods into single progression
E069 major consolidation: usage hours, records, and values appropriately combined
P011/P012 comprehensive workflow consolidations from legacy protocols

pass_c_mapping_detailed.summary: Overall mapping quality 100.0% - Perfect relationship integrity

claim_to_evidence.notes: All claim types well-supported: quantitative (direct measurement), qualitative (author assertion), literature (citation-based), causal (multi-evidence triangulation)

method_to_design.notes: Dual implementations appropriate: M002, M003, IM001 correctly implement both RD001 and RD002

protocol_to_method.notes: Dual/triple implementations appropriate: IP002, IP004, IP006, IP008 correctly implement multiple methods as cross-cutting protocols

key_findings: RDMAP hierarchy fully intact: Design → Method → Protocol cascade complete
All 73 claims have appropriate evidence support
Both research designs have complete method coverage
All methods have appropriate protocol coverage (M003: 7 protocols, M004: 5 protocols)
Dual implementations justified and correct (no spurious mappings)
Multi-evidence triangulation for causal claims (e.g., C010 → E009, E010, E011)
Comprehensive coverage: no missing critical relationships

patterns_identified.description: All three passes (Accuracy, Granularity, Mapping) achieved 100% scores with zero errors, zero issues, and zero weaknesses
patterns_identified.significance: Demonstrates mastery of extraction methodology and represents gold-standard extraction quality

patterns_identified.description: 16 evidence consolidations demonstrate sophisticated editorial judgment, balancing atomic principle with functional usefulness
patterns_identified.significance: Consolidation metadata complete for all items, preserving full information while avoiding over-splitting. Notable examples: E031 (phase aggregation), E069 (major consolidation), P011/P012 (workflow consolidation)

patterns_identified.description: 9 implicit items (2 methods, 7 protocols) appropriately inferred with solid reasoning and transparency gap documentation
patterns_identified.significance: Demonstrates ability to identify and document undocumented methods/protocols, enhancing transparency assessment capability

patterns_identified.description: Design → Method → Protocol relationships fully intact with appropriate dual/multiple implementations where methods/protocols serve multiple purposes
patterns_identified.significance: Enables clear understanding of research design implementation and methodological choices

patterns_identified.description: Similar types of information treated with uniform granularity within item types (requirements, capabilities, performance metrics)
patterns_identified.significance: Supports systematic assessment and comparison across similar types of items

patterns_identified.description: Complex claims supported by multiple evidence items triangulating from different sources/perspectives
patterns_identified.significance: Demonstrates sophisticated understanding of claim-evidence relationships, particularly for causal and evaluative claims

patterns_identified.description: All 169 items traceable to source text with accurate verbatim quotes and locations
patterns_identified.significance: Perfect fidelity to source material without introducing false information

strengths: Perfect accuracy (100%): Zero errors across all 169 items
Perfect granularity (100%): Zero over-splitting, zero under-splitting, zero inconsistencies
Perfect mapping (100%): Zero weak mappings, zero incorrect mappings
Exemplary consolidation execution: 16 evidence consolidations with complete metadata
Comprehensive implicit item inference: 9 items with solid reasoning and transparency gaps
Strong RDMAP hierarchy: Complete Design → Method → Protocol cascade
Consistent granularity patterns: Uniform treatment within item types
Zero hallucinations: All items traceable to source text
Complete location accuracy: All page/section references correct
Appropriate categorisations: All claim types/natures correctly assigned
recommendations: Use as gold-standard reference for future extractions
Consider using as training example for extraction quality
No corrections or refinements needed - extraction is production-ready
overall_assessment.fitness_for_use: Perfect for all purposes including research transparency assessment, replicability evaluation, and methodological analysis. Extraction quality represents gold standard for systematic extraction from methodological papers. All components (evidence, claims, methods, protocols, designs, and relationships) are production-ready without any refinements needed.
